subject: General English
question_en: Read the sentence and find out if any part has an error: 'Each of the players / have to bring / their own equipment.'
question_hi: वाक्य को पढ़ें और बताएँ कि कोई भाग गलत है या नहीं: 'Each of the players / have to bring / their own equipment.'
explanation_en: With 'each of' the verb should be singular 'has' instead of plural 'have'.
explanation_hi: 'Each of' के साथ क्रिया एकवचन 'has' आती है, बहुवचन 'have' नहीं।

subject: General English
question_en: Spot the error in: 'The number of applicants / are increasing / every year.'
question_hi: इस वाक्य में त्रुटि खोजें: 'The number of applicants / are increasing / every year.'
explanation_en: 'The number of' takes a singular verb, so 'is increasing' is correct.
explanation_hi: 'The number of' के बाद एकवचन क्रिया आती है, इसलिए 'is increasing' सही है।

subject: General English
question_en: Identify the incorrect part: 'She is the most prettiest / girl in / the entire class.'
question_hi: गलत भाग पहचानें: 'She is the most prettiest / girl in / the entire class.'
explanation_en: Double comparative: 'prettiest' already means most pretty, so remove 'most'.
explanation_hi: दोहरा comparative: 'prettiest' में पहले ही 'most' समाहित है, इसलिए 'most' हटाएँ।

subject: General English
question_en: Choose the part with error: 'Neither of the books / are / worth reading.'
question_hi: गलत भाग चुनें: 'Neither of the books / are / worth reading.'
explanation_en: 'Neither' is singular, so verb should be 'is'.

subject: General English
question_en: Find the error: 'The manager as well as / his assistants / were present.'
question_hi: त्रुटि खोजें: 'The manager as well as / his assistants / were present.'
explanation_en: When 'as well as' joins subjects, the verb agrees with the first subject (manager → singular), so 'was' is correct.
explanation_hi: 'as well as' जोड़ता है तो क्रिया पहले subject (manager → एकवचन) के अनुसार 'was' होगी।

subject: General English
question_en: Spot the mistake: 'One of my friend / is a doctor / in AIIMS.'
question_hi: गलती पहचानें: 'One of my friend / is a doctor / in AIIMS.'
explanation_en: 'One of' must be followed by plural noun: 'friends'.
explanation_hi: 'One of' के बाद बहुवचन संज्ञा आती है: 'friends'।

subject: General English
question_en: Choose the incorrect part: 'The news / are / very encouraging.'
question_hi: गलत भाग चुनें: 'The news / are / very encouraging.'
explanation_en: 'News' is uncountable and takes singular verb 'is'.
explanation_hi: 'News' गैण्टगणनीय है और एकवचन क्रिया 'is' लेता है।

subject: General English
question_en: Find the error: 'She requested / that she may / leave early.'
question_hi: त्रुटि खोजें: 'She requested / that she may / leave early.'
explanation_en: After 'requested' we use 'might' in indirect speech instead of 'may'.
explanation_hi: 'Requested' के बाद अप्रत्यक्ष वाचन में 'may' की जगह 'might' आता है।

subject: General English
question_en: Spot the error: 'The scissors / is / very sharp.'
question_hi: त्रुटि खोजें: 'The scissors / is / very sharp.'
explanation_en: 'Scissors' is always plural, so verb should be 'are'.
explanation_hi: 'Scissors' सदा बहुवचन है, इसलिए क्रिया 'are' होगी।

subject: General English
question_en: Identify the incorrect part: 'I look forward / to meet / you tomorrow.'
question_hi: गलत भाग पहचानें: 'I look forward / to meet / you tomorrow.'
explanation_en: 'Look forward to' is followed by a gerund: 'to meeting'.
explanation_hi: 'Look forward to' के बाद gerund आता है: 'to meeting'।
